title: Bug 7367exception in file system import wizard page
description: Bug 7367exception in file system import wizard page Using eclipse stable build 200112191.
OB: Type a letter in the Folder field (as long as there is no project with thename of that one letter).You get a Null pointer exception.Easy to fix.InWizardFileSystemResourceImportPage1sourceConflictsWithDestination add thefollowing check before the return statement:if (getSpecifiedContainer() == null)return false;
SR: File Import2. Choose file system; Next3. Click Browse button next to Directory field.Choose a directory (e.g d:/)4. Type a letter in the Folder field (as long as there is no project with thename of that one letter).You get a Null pointer exception.Easy to fix.InWizardFileSystemResourceImportPage1sourceConflictsWithDestination add thefollowing check before the return statement:if (getSpecifiedContainer() == null)return false;
